title: Paneer Butter Masala
ingredients: paneer, tomato, onion, butter, cream, garam masala, chili
steps: Saute onion tomato spices; add paneer and cream.

title: Palak Paneer
ingredients: spinach, paneer, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, spices
steps: Cook spinach; blend; simmer with paneer.

title: Chana Masala
ingredients: chickpeas, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, chili, garam masala
steps: Cook onion tomato; add chickpeas and spices.

title: Aglio e Olio
ingredients: spaghetti, garlic, olive oil, chili flakes, parsley, salt
steps: Cook pasta; toss with garlic oil and chili.

title: Veg Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, carrot, beans, peas, soy sauce, garlic, spring onion
steps: Stir-fry veggies; add rice and sauce.

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: chicken, onion, tomato, garlic, ginger, spices
steps: Cook onion tomato; add chicken and simmer.

title: Veg Pulao
ingredients: rice, peas, carrot, beans, cumin, garam masala
steps: Cook spiced rice with vegetables.

title: Tomato Soup
ingredients: tomato, onion, garlic, butter, cream, pepper
steps: Simmer and blend; finish with cream.

title: Masala Omelette
ingredients: egg, onion, tomato, chili, coriander, salt
steps: Beat eggs; cook with masala veggies.

title: Vegan Buddha Bowl
ingredients: quinoa, chickpeas, avocado, cucumber, spinach, tahini
steps: Cook quinoa; assemble with veggies and sauce.

title: Tacos
ingredients: tortillas, beans, tomato, lettuce, cheese, salsa
steps: Warm tortillas; fill with beans and toppings.

title: Stir-fry Tofu
ingredients: tofu, broccoli, bell pepper, soy sauce, garlic, ginger
steps: Stir-fry tofu and veggies; add sauce.

title: Paneer Tikka
ingredients: paneer, yogurt, ginger garlic paste, chili powder, garam masala, lemon, capsicum, onion, oil, salt
steps: Marinate paneer and veggies with spiced yogurt; skewer; grill or roast until charred.

title: Dal Tadka
ingredients: toor dal, onion, tomato, garlic, cumin, mustard, turmeric, ghee, chili, coriander
steps: Pressure cook dal; temper ghee with cumin, mustard, garlic and chili; mix with dal and simmer.

title: Rajma Masala
ingredients: kidney beans, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chili, garam masala, cumin, oil, salt
steps: Cook soaked rajma; make onion‑tomato masala; simmer with spices until thick.

title: Aloo Gobi
ingredients: potato, cauliflower, onion, tomato, ginger, turmeric, cumin, coriander powder, chili, oil, salt
steps: Sauté spices; add potatoes and cauliflower; cook covered until tender.

title: Bhindi Masala
ingredients: okra, onion, tomato, cumin, chili, coriander powder, amchur, oil, salt
steps: Stir‑fry okra separately; cook onion‑tomato masala; combine and finish with amchur.

title: Baingan Bharta
ingredients: eggplant, onion, tomato, garlic, green chili, cumin, oil, coriander
steps: Roast eggplant; mash; cook with onion‑tomato‑spice base until smoky.

title: Veg Biryani
ingredients: basmati rice, mixed vegetables, yogurt, fried onion, biryani masala, saffron, mint, ghee, whole spices
steps: Parboil rice; layer with spiced veggies and fried onion; dum cook until aromatic.

title: Kadai Paneer
ingredients: paneer, onion, tomato, capsicum, kadai masala, ginger, garlic, oil, kasuri methi, salt
steps: Roast kadai masala; stir‑fry onion and capsicum; add tomato gravy and paneer; finish with methi.

title: Matar Paneer
ingredients: paneer, green peas, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, garam masala, chili, oil, salt
steps: Cook onion‑tomato gravy; add peas and paneer; simmer until peas are tender.

title: Malai Kofta
ingredients: paneer, potato, cream, cashew, onion, tomato, garam masala, chili, oil, salt
steps: Fry kofta balls; make rich cashew‑tomato gravy; simmer koftas briefly.

title: Sambar
ingredients: toor dal, tamarind, mixed vegetables, sambar powder, mustard, curry leaves, oil, salt
steps: Cook dal; boil veggies with tamarind; add sambar powder; temper with mustard and curry leaves.

title: Dosa
ingredients: rice, urad dal, fenugreek, salt, oil
steps: Soak and grind batter; ferment; spread on tawa; cook crisp with oil.

title: Pav Bhaji
ingredients: potato, cauliflower, peas, capsicum, onion, tomato, pav bhaji masala, butter, lemon, coriander
steps: Mash boiled veggies with masala and butter; toast pav; serve with lemon.

title: Poha
ingredients: flattened rice, onion, potato, green chili, mustard, curry leaves, turmeric, peanuts, lemon
steps: Temper mustard and curry leaves; sauté onion and potato; toss poha and finish with lemon.

title: Upma
ingredients: semolina, onion, green chili, ginger, mustard, curry leaves, vegetables, ghee, salt
steps: Roast semolina; temper spices; add veggies and water; cook to thick porridge.

title: Jeera Rice
ingredients: basmati rice, cumin, ghee, bay leaf, salt
steps: Temper cumin in ghee; add cooked rice; toss fragrant.

title: Palak Corn
ingredients: spinach, sweet corn, onion, tomato, garlic, garam masala, cream, oil, salt
steps: Blanch and puree spinach; cook with corn and spices; finish with cream.

title: Tawa Pulao
ingredients: rice, onion, tomato, capsicum, pav bhaji masala, peas, butter, lemon, coriander
steps: Stir‑fry veggies with masala; toss rice and finish with butter and lemon.

title: Kadhi Pakora
ingredients: gram flour, yogurt, onion, chili, turmeric, cumin, mustard, curry leaves, oil, salt
steps: Make pakoras; simmer yogurt‑besan kadhi; temper with spices and add pakoras.

title: Veg Korma
ingredients: mixed vegetables, coconut, cashew, onion, tomato, korma masala, poppy seeds, oil, salt
steps: Blend coconut‑cashew; cook veggies in spiced gravy until creamy.

title: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: basmati rice, chicken, fried onion, yogurt, biryani masala, saffron, mint, ghee, whole spices
steps: Marinate chicken; layer with parboiled rice and fried onion; dum cook.

title: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: chicken, yogurt, tandoori masala, lemon, ginger garlic paste, oil, salt
steps: Marinate chicken; roast or grill until charred and cooked through.

title: Egg Curry
ingredients: eggs, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chili, garam masala, oil, salt
steps: Boil eggs; cook onion‑tomato masala; simmer eggs in gravy.

title: Goan Fish Curry
ingredients: firm fish, coconut milk, tamarind, onion, tomato, kokum (optional), chili, spices, oil, salt
steps: Simmer fish in spiced coconut gravy with tamarind until just cooked.

title: Prawn Masala
ingredients: prawns, onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chili, garam masala, oil, salt
steps: Sauté masala; add prawns; cook briefly until pink.

title: Margherita Pizza
ingredients: pizza dough, tomato sauce, mozzarella, basil, olive oil, salt
steps: Stretch dough; top with sauce and mozzarella; bake; finish with basil and oil.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
ingredients: spaghetti, minced meat, onion, carrot, celery, tomato, garlic, olive oil, herbs, salt
steps: Sauté soffritto; brown meat; add tomato and simmer; toss with pasta.

title: Mushroom Risotto
ingredients: arborio rice, mushrooms, onion, garlic, butter, stock, parmesan, white wine, parsley
steps: Toast rice; add wine; add stock gradually, stirring; finish with butter and parmesan.

title: Penne Arrabbiata
ingredients: penne, tomato, garlic, chili flakes, olive oil, parsley, salt
steps: Cook pasta; simmer garlicky chili‑tomato sauce; toss together.

title: Pesto Pasta
ingredients: pasta, basil, pine nuts, garlic, parmesan, olive oil, salt
steps: Blend pesto; toss with hot pasta and pasta water.

title: Chicken Alfredo Pasta
ingredients: fettuccine, chicken, cream, butter, garlic, parmesan, pepper, salt
steps: Sear chicken; make creamy garlic sauce; toss with pasta.

title: Hummus
ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, lemon, garlic, olive oil, cumin, salt
steps: Blend all until smooth; adjust lemon and salt; drizzle oil.

title: Falafel
ingredients: chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cumin, coriander, flour, baking powder, oil, salt
steps: Blend coarse mixture; shape and fry until crisp.

title: Tabbouleh
ingredients: bulgur, parsley, mint, tomato, cucumber, lemon, olive oil, salt
steps: Hydrate bulgur; toss with chopped herbs and vegetables; dress with lemon oil.

title: Shakshuka
ingredients: eggs, tomato, onion, bell pepper, garlic, cumin, paprika, olive oil, salt
steps: Simmer spiced tomato‑pepper base; poach eggs on top.

title: Greek Salad
ingredients: cucumber, tomato, red onion, olives, feta, oregano, olive oil, lemon, salt
steps: Chop veggies; toss with feta and oregano‑lemon dressing.

title: Veg Quesadilla
ingredients: tortillas, bell pepper, onion, corn, beans, cheese, chili powder, oil, salt
steps: Sauté filling; add cheese in tortillas; toast until melted.

title: Beef Tacos
ingredients: tortillas, minced beef, onion, tomato, chili powder, cumin, lettuce, salsa, cheese, oil, salt
steps: Brown beef with spices; fill tortillas; top with salsa and lettuce.

title: Guacamole
ingredients: avocado, onion, tomato, lime, cilantro, jalapeño, salt
steps: Mash avocado; fold in chopped veg and lime; season.

title: Vegetable Enchiladas
ingredients: tortillas, mixed vegetables, beans, enchilada sauce, cheese, spices, oil, salt
steps: Roll veggie‑bean filling; cover with sauce and cheese; bake.

title: Chicken Fajitas
ingredients: chicken, bell pepper, onion, chili powder, cumin, lime, tortillas, oil, salt
steps: Sear seasoned chicken and peppers; serve with warm tortillas.

title: Veg Hakka Noodles
ingredients: noodles, cabbage, carrot, bell pepper, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, spring onion, oil, pepper
steps: Stir‑fry veggies; toss boiled noodles with sauces over high heat.

title: Chicken Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, chicken, egg, peas, carrot, soy sauce, garlic, spring onion, oil, pepper
steps: Stir‑fry chicken; add rice and vegetables; season with soy and pepper.

title: Mapo Tofu
ingredients: tofu, minced meat, doubanjiang, garlic, ginger, Sichuan pepper, soy sauce, stock, oil
steps: Simmer tofu in spicy bean paste gravy with minced meat.

title: General Tso’s Tofu
ingredients: tofu, corn starch, soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, garlic, chili, sesame, oil
steps: Crisp tofu; toss in tangy‑spicy sauce; garnish sesame.

title: Veg Manchurian
ingredients: cabbage, carrot, capsicum, flour, cornflour, soy sauce, chili sauce, garlic, oil, salt
steps: Fry veg balls; simmer in spicy soy‑garlic gravy.

title: Pad Thai (Veg)
ingredients: rice noodles, tofu, egg (optional), tamarind, palm sugar, fish sauce/soy, peanut, bean sprout, garlic
steps: Soak noodles; stir‑fry sauce with tofu; toss noodles; top sprouts and peanuts.

title: Tom Yum Soup
ingredients: stock, lemongrass, galangal, kaffir lime leaves, chili, mushroom, fish sauce/soy, lime
steps: Simmer aromatics; add mushrooms; season sour‑spicy; finish with lime.

title: Veg Ramen
ingredients: ramen noodles, vegetable stock, soy sauce, miso, mushroom, bok choy, corn, spring onion, sesame
steps: Simmer broth with miso/soy; add toppings; cook noodles separately and combine.

title: Sushi Veg Roll
ingredients: sushi rice, nori, cucumber, avocado, carrot, rice vinegar, sugar, salt, soy sauce
steps: Spread rice on nori; add fillings; roll tightly and slice.

title: Bibimbap (Veg)
ingredients: rice, spinach, carrot, zucchini, mushrooms, gochujang, sesame oil, egg/tofu
steps: Sauté toppings; arrange on rice; add gochujang; top with egg or tofu.

title: Kimchi Fried Rice
ingredients: rice, kimchi, gochujang, spring onion, sesame oil, egg/tofu
steps: Stir‑fry kimchi with rice and gochujang; top with egg or tofu.

title: Ratatouille
ingredients: eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, tomato, onion, garlic, thyme, olive oil, salt
steps: Slice and stew vegetables with herbs until tender.

title: Gazpacho
ingredients: tomato, cucumber, bell pepper, onion, garlic, olive oil, sherry vinegar, bread, salt
steps: Blend chilled raw vegetables and season; serve cold.

title: Spanish Omelette
ingredients: egg, potato, onion, olive oil, salt
steps: Slow‑fry potato and onion; bind with egg; set into a tortilla.

title: Minestrone Soup
ingredients: beans, pasta, tomato, celery, carrot, onion, stock, herbs, olive oil, salt
steps: Sauté vegetables; add stock, beans, pasta; simmer until tender.

title: Shepherd’s Pie
ingredients: minced lamb/beef, onion, carrot, peas, gravy, mashed potato, butter
steps: Cook meat filling; top with mash; bake until browned.

title: Fish and Chips
ingredients: white fish, flour, baking powder, beer/water, potato, oil, salt
steps: Batter and fry fish; fry chips until crisp; season.

title: Rösti with Mushrooms
ingredients: potato, butter/oil, salt, pepper, mushrooms, garlic, parsley
steps: Grate potato and pan‑fry into a cake; sauté mushrooms; serve together.

title: Caponata
ingredients: eggplant, celery, onion, tomato, capers, olives, vinegar, sugar, olive oil, salt
steps: Fry eggplant; simmer sweet‑sour vegetable relish; serve warm or cold.

title: Penne Puttanesca
ingredients: penne, tomato, garlic, olive, capers, anchovy (optional), chili, olive oil
steps: Simmer pungent tomato sauce; toss with pasta.

title: Caesar Salad
ingredients: romaine, croutons, parmesan, anchovy, garlic, lemon, olive oil, egg/yogurt
steps: Blend dressing; toss with lettuce and croutons; shave parmesan.

title: Veg Chili
ingredients: kidney beans, black beans, tomato, onion, bell pepper, chili powder, cumin, garlic, oil, salt
steps: Simmer beans with spiced tomato base until thick.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: bread, cheddar, butter
steps: Butter bread; grill with cheese until melty and crisp.

title: Roasted Veggies & Quinoa
ingredients: quinoa, bell pepper, zucchini, carrot, broccoli, olive oil, herbs, lemon, salt
steps: Roast vegetables; cook quinoa; toss with lemon and herbs.

title: Lentil Soup
ingredients: lentils, onion, carrot, celery, garlic, tomato, cumin, stock, olive oil, salt
steps: Sauté aromatics; simmer lentils in stock until tender.

title: Couscous Salad
ingredients: couscous, chickpeas, cucumber, tomato, parsley, lemon, olive oil, salt
steps: Steam couscous; toss with vegetables and lemon‑oil dressing.

title: Veg Queso-less Nachos
ingredients: tortilla chips, beans, pico de gallo, guacamole, jalapeño, corn
steps: Layer chips with warm beans and toppings; serve immediately.

title: Stuffed Bell Peppers
ingredients: bell peppers, rice, beans/meat, onion, tomato, spices, cheese (optional)
steps: Stuff peppers with filling; bake until tender.

title: Tofu Stir-fry
ingredients: tofu, broccoli, bell pepper, soy sauce, garlic, ginger, cornflour, oil
steps: Crisp tofu; stir‑fry vegetables; glaze with soy‑garlic sauce.

title: Miso Glazed Eggplant
ingredients: eggplant, miso, mirin, sugar, sesame, oil
steps: Roast eggplant; brush miso glaze; broil until caramelized.

title: Avocado Toast
ingredients: bread, avocado, lemon, chili flakes, salt, pepper, olive oil
steps: Toast bread; mash avocado with lemon; spread and top.
